title: Biometric Authentication
description: Add fingerprint and face unlock as an optional authentication method with secure storage integration.
instructions:
Implement biometric authentication:

1. Check device biometric capabilities
2. Add biometric toggle in security settings
3. Store encrypted credentials for biometric unlock
4. Show biometric prompt on app launch (if enabled)
5. Implement fallback to password entry
6. Handle biometric failures gracefully
7. Clear biometric data on logout

hints.text: Use the local_auth package for cross-platform biometric authentication
Always check both canCheckBiometrics and isDeviceSupported for full compatibility
Handle lockout states (temporary and permanent) by falling back to password

commonMistakes.mistake: Not clearing biometric data when user logs out
commonMistakes.consequence: Previous user's credentials could be accessed by next user
commonMistakes.correction: Always call disableBiometric() as part of the logout flow

commonMistakes.mistake: Using biometricOnly: true without fallback option
commonMistakes.consequence: User locked out if biometric fails repeatedly
commonMistakes.correction: Provide password fallback option and handle lockedOut/permanentlyLockedOut errors
